channel.title: RSS Aggregator Feed
channel.description: An aggregated feed of Technology-related news

item.title: Wondering what to watch this Valentine’s Day? Stream a movie spicier and more satisfying than ‘Wuthering Heights’ from home — and it’s free
item.description: If you've read my 'Wuthering Heights' review, you'll know why I won't be rushing to rewatch it this Valentine's Day. So may I suggest this sexier, and completely free, movie instead?

item.title: I donned a frilly dress and tracked ghosts for hours in Fatal Frame 2: Crimson Butterfly Remake — and now I can’t wait for the full release
item.description: The upcoming Fatal Frame 2: Crimson Butterfly Remake is shaping up to be an excellent introduction to the cult survival horror series.
